mapper.select: select distinct m.mname from orderlist o join fproduct f on f.pid = o.pid join merchant m on m.mid=f.mid

select distinct vv.pname as pname from (select f.mid,f.pname from orderlist o join fproduct f on f.pid = o.pid join (select max(ss.type) ,ss.mid from ( select count(distinct a.pname) as type ,a.mid from (select o.pid , f.pname,f.mid from orderlist o join fproduct f on o.pid=f.pid ) a group by mid) as ss) as sss on sss.mid=f.mid) as vv

select ss.tol,ss.pname,m.mname from ( select sum(a.tol) as tol, a.pname,a.mid from ( select sum(count) as tol,f.pname as pname,f.mid from orderList o join fproduct f on o.pid=f.pid group by o.pid) a group by a.mid,a.pname ) as ss join merchant m on ss.mid=m.mid
select sum(count) as tol,f.pname as name from orderList o join fproduct f on o.pid=f.pid group by o.pid

select of.createDate as createDate , of.stage as stage , of.name as oname , oc.count as pnumber ,oc.oid as oid from orderform of join (select oid,count from orderlist where pid = #{pid}) oc on oc.oid=of.id
select sum(totalprice) as totalprice from orderlist where oid =#{oid}
select count(*) from orderList where oid=#{oid}
